description: News about Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc., including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
title_page: Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. - The New York Times
maintext:
With Discovery merger pending, Warner Bros. chief Ann Sarnoff is set to leave.
Ms. Sarnoff became the first woman to hold the job in 2019, but Discoveryâ€™s C.E.O. is expected to take over at least some of her role himself.
